description.default: Open Chinese Convert (OpenCC) is an opensource project for conversions between Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese and Japanese Kanji (Shinjitai). It supports character-level and phrase-level conversion, character variant conversion and regional idioms among Mainland China, Taiwan and Hong Kong. This is not translation tool between Mandarin and Cantonese, etc.
description.zh_CN: 开放中文转换 (Open Chinese Convert, OpenCC)是一个中文简繁转换开源项目，支持词汇级别的转换、异体字转换和地区习惯用词转换（中国大陆、台湾、香港、日本新字体）。不提供普通话与粤语的转换。
description.zh_CHT: 開放中文轉換 (Open Chinese Convert, OpenCC)是一個中文簡繁轉換開源項目，支持詞彙級別的轉換、異體字轉換和地區習慣用詞轉換（中國大陸、臺灣、香港、日本新字體）。不提供普通話與粵語的轉換。
